Package edu.univ.scientometrics.repository

Class ResearcherRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
edu.univ.scientometrics.repository.ResearcherRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResearcherRepository
@Repository @Transactional(readOnly=true) public class ResearcherRepositoryImpl extends Object implements ResearcherRepository
JPA implementation of ResearcherRepository. Handles all database operations for researchers using EntityManager. Follows same patterns as ArticleRepositoryImpl for consistency.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Sprint 3 Team

    • findByAuthorId

      public Optional<ResearcherEntity> findByAuthorId(String authorId)

      Specified by:
